text: Thanks Derek, I've been using this guide but still getting lost having never used CLI commands, I think I just need someone to show me how to do it once then I would be good to go

Good morning all. We’re currently developing a new theme for an existing HubSpot customer, using a developer sandbox. What’s the best practice when we are ready to go live for moving the new theme - files, menus, hubdb, all of it.. into the customer account?
I should have some time today to spin up a quick example video, stay tuned
You can use the CLI to move the theme folder and File Manager files. HubDB you can export/import, but you cant move menus
Yep exactly. That option appears to be optional.
